item.title: State of the State of the Union
item.description:
When I was a kid, I remember watching the State of the Union address every year. My father was a sixth-grade teacher, and also extremely interested in politics, so it was definitely going to be on, and by the mid-80‚Äôs I was paying enough attention to politics on my own that I would also tune in. I remember laughing about Tip O‚ÄôNeill appearing to just op‚Ä¶

URL: https://chadorzel.substack.com/p/state-of-the-state-of-the-union?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: The Thin Gruel of Monetary-Policy Discussion These Days
